page.title: 17INTERVIEWING MUMMY AND DADDY
page.content: My Mummy and Daddy work in a pub, Mummy works in the restaurant and Daddy works in the Bar but Mummy wishes that she could work in the Bar and Daddy wishes that he could work in the restaurant. On Saturday I interveiwed Mummy and Daddy and here are some of the questions:I asked Mummy if she gets friends in the restaurant and mummy said she gets a lot of people in the restaurant that she knows. I asked Mummy if she gets a lot of people in the restaurant and Mummy said that the busiest days of the week are Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday. Then I interviewed Daddy. Daddy is much busier than Mummy everyday. Daddy's busiest days of the week are Wednesday, Tuesday and Saturday and Sunday. The drink Daddy sells most of is beer and soft drinks .
